@mervboyj wrote:

well the one code u show in the message is that where theres an error cause i aint finding any unless if i send u the whole coding of my server[br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2007, 05:01:34 AM[/size][hr]and could u fix it…and could u fix it so that my friends can have the commands too cause there owners but they just cant use the codes and i dont know what u mean by overlapping

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with owners
item.dc:creator: @Jordanz_Pk Jordanz Pk
item.description:
@Jordanz_Pk wrote:

Mabye on somewhere else there are words overlapping the commands you want on the menu or w/e you are trying to put it on.

Make sure there are no words overlapping (or having the same end number)
Ex:

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it is currently off", 8171);
                                                                                  ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with owners
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

yes it is it is in main menu look

public void MainHelpMenu(){
if(playerRights >= 0){
if(playerRights

== 0) {

sendQuest("@dre@ Menu and Help Menu ", 8144);

//Regular player title
}
if(playerRights

== 1) {

sendQuest("@dre@Moderator Help Menu", 8144);

//Moderator Title
}
if(playerRights

== 2) {

sendQuest("@dre@Administrator Help Menu", 8144);

//Administrator Title
}

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mervboyj”) &&

playerRights >= 2) { // Owner Title

sendQuest("@dre@Owner’s Help Menu", 8144);
}

clearQuestInterface();

sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to

@red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y

@red@p@gre@k", 8145);

sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from

@blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPa

rt4+" @gre@ “+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+” @dre@

days ago.@dbl@", 8147);

sendQuest("@dre@Players online:

@gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8148);
sendQuest("@blu@===Your

PK Stats===", 8149);
sendQuest("@red@Total Kills

  • “+killcount, 8150);
    sendQuest(”@red@Pk Points -

“+pkpoints, 8151);
sendQuest(”@red@Death

Count - "+deathcount, 8152);

sendQuest("@dbl@Regular Player Commands", 8154);

sendQuest("@blu@::help @red@ Shows this help

menu", 8155);

sendQuest("@blu@::info @red@ Shows

@red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y

@red@p@gre@k@red@ server information", 8156);

sendQuest("@blu@::rules @red@ Shows the

@red@h@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y

@red@p@gre@k@red@ rules", 8157);

sendQuest("@blu@::starter @red@ Gives you a once off

starter pack", 8158);

sendQuest("@blu@::maxprayer @red@ Gives you 99

prayer", 8159);

sendQuest("@blu@::food @red@ Gives you an invent of

food", 8160);

sendQuest("@blu@::charge @red@ Charge spell - only

works with 80+ magic", 8161);

sendQuest("@blu@::players @red@ Tells you how

many people are on and shows who", 8162);

sendQuest("@blu@::empty @red@ Gets rid of ALL

items in your inventory", 8163);

sendQuest("@blu@::pass newpass @red@ Changes

your account’s password", 8164);

sendQuest("@blu@::yell @red@ Sends a message to all

logged in players", 8165);

sendQuest("@blu@::char @red@ Brings up the screen

to change your appearance", 8166);

sendQuest("@blu@::range @red@ Takes you to the

range training spot", 8167);

sendQuest("@blu@::mystats @red@ Shows you your

account information", 8168);

if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mervboyj”) &&

playerRights == 0) {

sendQuest("@dbl@For more help, ask one of our

friendly Admins or Mods", 8170);
}

if(playerRights == 1) {

sendQuest("@dbl@Moderator Level Commands",

8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::playercheck @red@ Checks

whether a player is muted etc", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::tempmute @red@ Temporarily

mutes a player; lasts 10mins", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::kick @red@ Kicks a player from

the server, don’t abuse", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::scythe @red@ Gives you a scythe,

so have fun with it", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::bank @red@ This will access your

bank from anywhere", 8175);

sendQuest("@dbl@Temporary mutes are not there to

play around with so if you", 8177);

sendQuest("@dbl@are caught abusing Mod features, I

will demote you, and you", 8178);

sendQuest("@dbl@will become a regular player once

again with no chance of", 8179);

sendQuest("@dbl@being a member of the

@red@H@gre@o@whi@c@red@k@gre@e@whi@y

@red@p@gre@k@red@ Team ever again.", 8180);
}

if(!playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“mervboyj”) &&

playerRights == 2) {

sendQuest("@dbl@Administrator Level Commands",

8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns PKing on if it

is currently off", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns PKing off if it

is currently on", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a

player - don’t abuse", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or

temp muted player", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::tb @red@ This will permanently

teleblock a player", 8175);

sendQuest("@blu@::untb @red@ This will unteleblock

a perm teleblocked player", 8176);

sendQuest("@blu@::immobilise @red@ Permanently

stops a player from moving", 8177);

sendQuest("@blu@::mobilise @red@ Allows an

immobilised player to move again", 8178);

sendQuest("@blu@::banuser @red@ Bans a user - Only

use this in extreme cases", 8179);

sendQuest("@blu@::checkip @red@ Checks the IP

address of players online", 8180);

sendQuest("@blu@::ipban @red@ IP Bans a player.

Consult mervboyj before use", 8181);

sendQuest("@blu@::xteletome @red@ Teleports any

player to you instantly", 8182);

sendQuest("@blu@::xteleto @red@ Teleports you to

any player instantly", 8183);

sendQuest("@blu@::master @red@ Maxes all of your

combat skills instantly", 8184);

sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives you some

decent PK gear to use", 8185);

sendQuest("@blu@::ahrims @red@ Gives you a full set

of Ahrims robes", 8186);

sendQuest("@blu@::money @red@ Gives you 2 Billion

gold. Have fun", 8187);

sendQuest("@blu@::rares @red@ Gives you a huge

number of rare items", 8188);

sendQuest("@blu@::pickup #### @red@ Gives you

any item based on Item ID", 8189);

sendQuest("@blu@::adminzone @red@ Takes you to

the Admin zone", 8190);

sendQuest("@blu@::god @red@ Makes you fly, and

gives you lots of energy", 8191);

sendQuest("@blu@::godoff @red@ This command will

turn the God command off", 8192);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes you

unable to be attacked by players", 8193);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes you

attackable again by players", 8194);
}

				}

sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj’s Personal Commands",

8170);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it

is currently off", 8171);

sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it

is currently on", 8172);

sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a

player, doesn’t run out", 8173);

sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or

temp muted player", 8174);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me

unable to be attacked by players", 8175);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me

attackable again by other players", 8176);

sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent

Pk gear to kill people", 8177);

sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player

into a Moderator instantly", 8178);

sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player

into an Admin instantly", 8179);

sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or

Mod back into a normal player", 8180);

sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command

to trigger an update if needed", 8181);

sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will

kick ALL players on the server", 8182);

sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who

can’t use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);

sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them unattackable by others", 8184);

sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to

make them attackable by players", 8185);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all

of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);

sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats

go back to their regular levels", 8187);

sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in

the main game window to players", 8188);

sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me

visible again if I am invisible", 8189);

sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right

click option change to IP ban", 8190);
}

item.title: Need help with owners
item.dc:creator: @mervboyj mervboyj
item.description:
@mervboyj wrote:

ok i have a full list of commands here and i am the owner

sendQuest("@dbl@mervboyj’s Personal Commands", 8170);
sendQuest("@blu@::pvpon @red@ Turns Pking on if it is currently off", 8171);
sendQuest("@blu@::pvpoff @red@ Turns Pking off if it is currently on", 8172);
sendQuest("@blu@::mute @red@ Permanently mutes a player, doesn’t run out", 8173);
sendQuest("@blu@::unmute @red@ Unmutes a perm or temp muted player", 8174);
sendQuest("@blu@::nowildme @red@ Makes me unable to be attacked by players", 8175);
sendQuest("@blu@::wildme @red@ Makes me attackable again by other players", 8176);
sendQuest("@blu@::gear @red@ Gives me some decent Pk gear to kill people", 8177);
sendQuest("@blu@::givemod @red@ Makes a player into a Moderator instantly", 8178);
sendQuest("@blu@::giveadmin @red@ Makes a player into an Admin instantly", 8179);
sendQuest("@blu@::demote @red@ Turns an Admin or Mod back into a normal player", 8180);
sendQuest("@blu@::update @red@ Use this command to trigger an update if needed", 8181);
sendQuest("@blu@::reboot @red@ This command will kick ALL players on the server", 8182);
sendQuest("@blu@::reset @red@ Use on an Admin who can’t use ::wildme etc anymore", 8183);
sendQuest("@blu@::nowildy @red@ Use on a player to make them unattackable by others", 8184);
sendQuest("@blu@::wildy @red@ Use on a player to make them attackable by players", 8185);
sendQuest("@blu@::ownage @red@ This will make all of my combat stats go to 500", 8186);
sendQuest("@blu@::ownageoff @red@ Makes my stats go back to their regular levels", 8187);
sendQuest("@blu@::hide @red@ Makes me invisible in the main game window to players", 8188);
sendQuest("@blu@::show @red@ This will make me visible again if I am invisible", 8189);
sendQuest("@blu@::rclickipban @red@ Makes the right click option change to IP ban", 8190);
}
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

now how come the commands dont come up on menu list when i log on and im the owner and my 2 friends are co-owners and they should have same thing but they cant do the commands but there still co-owners that kinda weird aint it?

plz help

Read full topic
